line_2: Then pensive they my Doom resent,

line_1: I ne'er design'd it for a Banishment.
line_2: 'Twas my Advice, you should awhile absent,

line_1: Why am I now condemn'd to Banishment,
line_2: And made an Exile by my Own Consent.

line_1: From his ungrateful Town to Banishment:
line_2: An Aristides from his Athens sent,
